title: Vector 3 Reversal Function
description: This function takes a 3D vector as input and returns a new vector that is the negation of the input vector. Each component of the vector is changed to its opposite sign.
name: V3_REV

input.name: A
input.description: The input vector whose components are to be reversed.

return_value.description: The output vector which is the negation of the input vector A.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The X component of the output vector, which is the negative of the X component of input vector A.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The Y component of the output vector, which is the negative of the Y component of input vector A.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The Z component of the output vector, which is the negative of the Z component of input vector A.
